sense.gloss: legal, lawful, legitimate, law-abiding, in order

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑行動↑↓こうどう↓は↑全↑↓まった↓く↑合法↑↓|ごうほう↓↑的↑↓てき|↓だ。

sdata.e: The Mafia uses legitimate business operations as a front.

sdata.e: It is better for you to act by legal means.

sdata.e: When a president or a governor acts wisely and lawfully, Americans express their approval by reelecting him and by supporting his political party.

sdata.e: They are filibustering to prevent the bill from passing.
